entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
